name: Stream Out
description:
Exports game and account information to image and text files which can be used in OBS and other streaming software.
Some update in real-time because they reflect your game's current state (eg. active
character's name, specialisation) while others update every 5 minutes as they reflect non-sensitive data from your
overall account (eg. wallet coins, PvP/WvW rank).
Legendary Insights, Legendary Divinations and Unstable Fractal Essences are exported from your www.killproof.me profile. Complementary pre-cropped static icons are provided for your convenience.
The default output folder can be located with the dropdown menu of the cogwheel button in the top-right corner when viewing the module's settings.

account.details: Always required if any other permission is present.

characters.details: Needed to record your death count.

progression.details: Needed to record your kill count and rank in PvP and WvW.

pvp.details: Needed to request your SPvP standings.

wallet.details: Needed to record the amount of gold, silver and copper in your possession.

guilds.details: Needed to request image resources required to render your current represented guild's' emblem.
